sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ méi xiǎngdào nǐ huì lái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ne m'attendais pas à ce que tu viennes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I didn't expect you to come.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 知道答案的同学请举手。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhīdào dá'àn de tóngxué qǐng jǔshǒu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les élèves qui connaissent la réponse, levez la main.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Students who know the answer, please raise your hand.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le maire vient inspecter aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The mayor is coming to inspect today.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de shǒujī méiyǒu wǎng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon téléphone n'a plus de connexion internet.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My phone has no internet connection.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 全体学生请到操场集合。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Quántǐ xuéshēng qǐng dào cāochǎng jíhé.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tous les élèves doivent se rassembler sur le terrain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: All students please gather at the playground.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīnwǎn yǒu yī chǎng yīnyuè huì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a un concert ce soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a concert tonight.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Merci pour ton aide !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Thank you for your help!

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai l'impression qu'il va pleuvoir aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I feel like it's going to rain today.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ma vie est très simple.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My life is very simple.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez informer tout le monde de la réunion de demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please notify everyone about the meeting tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今天太冷了，穿件大衣吧。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān tài lěng le, chuān jiàn dàyī ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait trop froid aujourd'hui, mets un manteau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's too cold today, wear a coat.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut écouter attentivement en classe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should listen carefully during class.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bienvenue à Pékin !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Welcome to Beijing!

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'espère qu'il fera beau demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I hope tomorrow will be sunny.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime voyager.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like traveling.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il mange souvent des nouilles instantanées.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He often eats instant noodles.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Merci pour ton soutien !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Thank you for your support!

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我今天在街上碰见了他。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ jīntiān zài jiē shàng pèngjiàn le tā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je l'ai rencontré dans la rue aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I ran into him on the street today.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 周末我们一起去爬山吧。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōumò wǒmen yīqǐ qù páshān ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons faire de la randonnée ensemble ce week-end.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go hiking together this weekend.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yùndòng hòu wǒ quánshēn dōu téng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Après l'exercice, j'ai mal partout.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: After exercising, my whole body hurts.
